text:
Ba#vatIqma(gg) stanaqmUrja#svantaM dhayAqpAmityAjya#sya pUqrNA(gg) sruca#M juhOtyEqSha vA aqgnErvi#mOqkO viqmucyaiqvAsmAq annaqmapi# dadhAtiq tasmA#dAhuqryaScaiqvaM ~MvEdaq yaScaq na suqdhAya(gm)# haq vai vAqjI suhi#tO dadhAqtItyaqgnirvAva vAqjI tamEqva tat prI#NAtiq sa E#naM prIqtaH prI#NAtiq vasI#yAn Bavati ( ) || 48
(praqtIcIq diktasyA$stE-dviqShmO yaSca#-niliqmpA nA-mEq ha gRuqhA-iti#-lUqkShO-vasI#yAn Bavati) (A10)
